name: Left to Rot New RPG & FPS GENRE!!!!
blurb: After the infection few survived. Leaving the world in Ruin. Learn how to Master this RTS and FPS Genera combined video game.

rewards.reward: Corpse: Eh, you're just a corpse. However there can't be zombies without corpses so this gets your name in the Special Thanks section of the credits.

Fresh Meat: Let's face it; we both know you would never make it through a zombie apocalypse. You know you are nothing more but fresh meat for the zombies to chew on so why not go out listening to some awesome jams. If you donate 5 dollars we will give you the custom soundtrack to the game! (Plus all previous donation rewards)

Condemned: Our game is filled with tons of condemned and decaying buildings. If the price is right you can even name on of these roads/structures after yourself. You can fight zombies on your home turf! (Plus all previous donation rewards)

Infected: In zombie survival everyone knows weapons are essential. How can you properly defend yourself without a good weapon? If you donate twenty-five dollars you will receive several custom skinned weapons for our multiplayer survivor mode. Furthermore, you will receive the beta for our game! On top of that you will receive 5 advance udk tutorials, that will include advance weapon code, and more.(Plus all previous donations rewards except condemned)

Undead: For every person amongst the undead there is always a back story. If you donate fifty dollars or more you will have your back-story placed within the game in the form of a journal. The player will find these journals throughout the game, essentially making your story a part of the game. Furthermore, to make the deal even sweeter, we will give you a free copy of the game upon release! (Plus all previous donation rewards except Condemned.

Acolyte: So have you decided to officially become our apocalyptic minion? Well this calls for a celebration! If you pay one-hundred dollars or more not only will you receive all previous donation rewards, but also a signed poster of our future team of superstars. Ontop of that you will also receive 20 advance tutorials! I will show you the secrets on how to do things in udk, that you will see in the game!

Slayer: What is it that most people enjoy about zombies? To us, it's slaying them! If you dish out 200 bucks, we will allow you to create your very own zombie slaying weapon for the game! We will do our best to accommodate all of your creative zombie slaying ideas! ( Plus all previous donation rewards.)

Zombie Herder: In zombie survival lingo most people speak of the weapons and survival tactics they would use when facing the horde. More often than not their means of transportation is overlooked in the conversation. If you donate five-hundred or more you will get your own customized vehicle to cruise around in during the game. We will try our hardest to accommodate your creative ideas into our game so you can effectively herd zombies while riding in style! To make matters even better, we will ship you a customized wood-burned game case full of goodies! ( Plus all previous donation rewards)

Hard Headed: Nothing is more terrifying than a zombie with a hard head. Generally speaking these zombies are harder to kill and wreak havoc across the land. If you donate one-thousand dollars or more you can have your very own hard-headed zombie boss implemented into the game. We can model any kind of gruesome monster idea you may have to be a special boss created just for you. Just think of all of the possibilities you could come up with for the undead swarm! (Plus all previous donation rewards)

Decapitator: What does every zombie survival camp need? Their own flag! We will send you the customized resistance flag found throughout the game. However, we do not stop there! We will also discuss how you can advertise in your game and allow you to be a team member throughout the design process. Furthermore, a major character of the game will be modeled and designed after you. (Plus all previous donation rewards.)

Bruce Campbell: By donating 10,000 you will get your name in the credits as an executive producer. We will also allow you to advertise in our game (there are several ways of doing so). Lastly, once the game is complete we will hold a company assembly in your honor and feed you some delicious food (with nothing infected of course... we would hate to see a top contributor turn into a flesh eater..or would we...mwahahahahahah!)
